amendment.description: To clarify certain authorities relating the Commission on the National Guard and Reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2457 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2457 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12507) To clarify certain authorities relating the Commission on the National Guard and Reserves.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2457 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2457 proposed by Senator Warner.
